data.message:
Love the top-hat. If you would kindly send it to me, we'll do some Facebook themed Fit-Chats in the middle of Geneva/Switzerland, wearing the hat. Then we'll call them "Facebook Hats" challenge some places on other continents to some Fit-Chats (starting with your Chicago office). See photos of the big red Fit-Chat ball and top-hat at http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fit-Chat/116935118317295
Pls mail the hat to the mayoress of Geneva Sandrine Salerno at http://www.facebook.com/geneve.sandrinesalerno and say it's for Fit-Chat. We'll wear it at the Geneva New Year's street party see http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=162562547120882 Happy Xmas ! This could be fun.
